user_query: flowers my paid for them beautiful thank you Annie Sharon you were on just after this number and before the magician yes I came about the ad at the door oh the bar job we found I forgot to take the ad off actually I was thinking maybe another job I'm an artist too do an I know all of Shakespeare by heart kid you're in the wrong theater this is a drag show no I understand if you can perform Shakespeare you can perform I'm sure you can't perform but get this folks come here to have fun not to watch some crossdresser in a wheelchair I understand for one song Rodney come on give him a chance just give him a little one come on please human the garden close the here here the show was your only source of income I was a kind of matchmaker I study the profile of a client and suggest companions that had similar interests quit extorting the hell out of her my dog gobbles your going answer right this second not only were they my best friends my most faithful companions but they also understood everything absolutely everything I told them I believe in the redistribution of wealth do you know that the 100 richest people are richer than the poorest billion nothing till 7 in the morning when the maids arrive they play for about 5 minutes and then it takes off there the dog see it's got the necklace the dog's got the necklace and uh what time did you realize the necklace was missing when I woke up at 7:00 the next morning okay so let me get this straight so the jewelry vanished sometime

entities.entity_description: Sharon은 Annie에게 꽃을 사준 인물이며, 공연 순서에서 마술사 전에 출연하는 것으로 보인다
Rodney는 드래그 쇼가 열리는 극장에서 일하는 인물로, 새로운 출연자에게 기회를 주라고 요청받는다

relationships.relationship_description: Rodney는 Sharon과 같은 극장에서 일하며, 새로운 출연자에게 기회를 주라는 요청을 받는다
